results.content: Great course on how to get started using bootstrap. An actual responsive website is built fairly quickly.

response.content: Thanks Jerry for posting your review and taking the course
response.content_html: Thanks Jerry for posting your review and taking the course

results.content_html: Great course on how to get started using bootstrap. An actual responsive website is built fairly quickly.

results.content:
The course is designed very well. The presentation is clear and  super easy to follow. For each design part, the author always explains the goal and draws it out, and then in the following video, he types the html code line by line, and, gives explanations at the same time. 

I watched all videos, and typed out all the code with the author. FYI, this is a short course of Bootstrap 4. It is designed for beginners.

I am a senior level Java EE developer. Even though I created JSP pages for some applications, front end is always my weakness. Actually, by learning this course in such a short time, I just applied the technique I learned from this course to update the navbar, and layout of a project I am working on recently.

Mr. Svekis, thank you. Your teaching style is fantastic.

response.content: Awesome thank you for your support best wishes - let me know if you need help in the Q&A
response.content_html: Awesome thank you for your support best wishes - let me know if you need help in the Q&A
